title: 214 - Get Your Portfolio Ready For $80 Oil (Kirk Spano)
description: Oil prices have taken a beating recently and related equities have been hit even harder. Should investors run away or jump and potential opportunities? Kirk and Brian pull the curtain back to see what's really going on and how investors can potentially benefit.
